menu.title: Chicken Wings
menu.description: Crispy fried wings tossed in your choice of sauce, served with celery and ranch.

menu.title: BBQ Ribs
menu.description: Tender pork ribs smothered in smoky BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw and fries.

menu.title: Nachos
menu.description: Tortilla chips loaded with cheese, jalapenos, sour cream, and salsa.

menu.title: Sliders
menu.description: Mini burgers topped with cheese, pickles, and a special sauce.

menu.title: Stuffed Jalapenos
menu.description: Jalapenos filled with cream cheese and wrapped in bacon.

menu.title: Fried Pickles
menu.description: Crispy dill pickles served with a side of ranch dressing.

menu.title: Quesadilla
menu.description: Grilled tortilla stuffed with cheese and your choice of chicken or beef, served with salsa and sour cream.

menu.title: Buffalo Shrimp
menu.description: Shrimp fried to perfection and tossed in buffalo sauce, served with celery and ranch.

menu.title: Onion Rings
menu.description: Crispy, golden onion rings served with a tangy dipping sauce.

menu.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
menu.description: A creamy blend of spinach, artichokes, and cheeses, served with tortilla chips.

menu.title: Mozzarella Sticks
menu.description: Breaded and fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

menu.title: Garlic Bread
menu.description: Toasted bread topped with garlic butter and parsley.

menu.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
menu.description: Mushrooms filled with a savory blend of cheeses and herbs.

menu.title: Bruschetta
menu.description: Toasted bread topped with a mixture of tomatoes, basil, and garlic.

menu.title: Shrimp Cocktail
menu.description: Chilled shrimp served with a tangy cocktail sauce.

menu.title: Potato Skins
menu.description: Potato halves topped with cheese, bacon, and green onions, served with sour cream.

menu.title: Fried Calamari
menu.description: Lightly breaded and fried calamari, served with marinara sauce.

menu.title: Cheese Fries
menu.description: Fries smothered in melted cheese and topped with bacon bits.

menu.title: Spring Rolls
menu.description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and served with a sweet chili sauce.

menu.title: Bacon Wrapped Dates
menu.description: Sweet dates wrapped in crispy bacon, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

menu.title: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with rice and vegetables.

menu.title: Ribeye Steak
menu.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with mashed potatoes and a side salad.

menu.title: Chicken Alfredo
menu.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce over fettuccine noodles, topped with grilled chicken.

menu.title: Beef Tacos
menu.description: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

menu.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Spaghetti tossed in a creamy sauce with bacon, Parmesan, and peas.

menu.title: Fish and Chips
menu.description: Beer-battered fish served with crispy fries and tartar sauce.

menu.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
menu.description: A medley of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served with rice.

menu.title: Lamb Chops
menu.description: Grilled lamb chops served with mint jelly and roasted potatoes.

menu.title: Chicken Parmesan
menu.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella, served with spaghetti.

menu.title: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
menu.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork in BBQ sauce, served on a bun with coleslaw.
